subject: Simsonn Pro Plus Pedal Upgrade Hydraulic Pedal Set Black
description_text:
Dear Sales Team,


I hope this message finds you well. We are reaching out from Urbanbull 
on behalf of our client who is interested in procuring your 
services/products mentioned in the subject line.

We would like to inquire about the possibility of purchasing 30 units of 
this product.

Could you please provide us with the following information:


Lead time for delivery to the following address:

Company Name: Urbanbull

Agent Name: Mike Thom

Address: 2705 Black Lake Place, Philadelphia, PA 19154

Country: USA


Availability status: If the product is in stock, kindly confirm. If not, 
we would appreciate it if you could check with your manufacturer and 
provide an estimated availability date.


Product link : 
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-pedal-upgrade-racing-simulator-professional-pedals?variant=51092811546938&country=US&currency=USD&utm_medium=product_sync&utm_source=google&utm_content=sag_organic&utm_campaign=sag_organic&gad_source=4&gad_campaignid=22502953810&gbraid=0AAAAA_HB8z_mKPmELHfBw-5iKPhrrpG_P&gclid=CjwKCAjw9anCBhAWEiwAqBJ-c2nfNbycMY6t0HiGK-ImBGcwWhf8PTT9YrNAOpMpQr__z2XLA91wVhoCQC0QAvD_BwE

Once we receive this information, we will proceed with obtaining 
approval from our client. Please include any relevant details such as 
shipping costs and payment terms in your quotation.

We kindly request that you send the invoice for our client's approval 
once the quotation is finalized.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. We look forward to 
your earliest response.


Mike Thom

Procurement

conversations.body_text: Hi，Mike_procurement，  We’ve assigned our Alibaba sales representative, Jenny, to send you an email that includes our product catalog. Please feel free to communicate your specific requirements with her, and we will provide you with prompt support.
